review: It's awesome but I do miss live TV! If they could make that available thru wifi without cable I'd give it 5 stars.
author: nini gabunia

review: Works very well I actually cut my cable bill in half and bought a second one for my other tv.
author: Norman Mccallson, L

review: I love it. .the only thing I don't like is that the advertising is misleading..a lot of the shows offered you have to pay for. ..or have an amazon subscription...it doesn't  mention that in the advertising of the stick..however I do like the variety of what's offered  once  you pay for memberships
author: IM Bossy!

review: I'm really enjoying my fire stick. I get to watch my prime and my Netflix right on my big TV now.  Much better then watching on my kindle.
author: christina

review: I received this as a gift and it is amazing!
author: Roy D. Brechbuhler

review: So muck better than I thought it would be
